pullRequest.title: Fix K8s format journal in HA mode
pullRequest.bodyText:
After PR #10686 we use PVs for master journals created by volumeClaimTemplates. This changed how we should format journals. Now each master has its own journal PV.
#10686
In Alluxio docker image there's no SSH capability (#10945), so commands like alluxio formatMasters cannot work. We need to invoke formatJournal directly on each master.
Previously we use a Job to invoke formatMasters when there's only master (in HA mode the journal volumes are emptyDir), now we need multiple Jobs to each handle one master in HA mode.

nodes.bodyText: Have a separate section for this journal formatting job. The resource should be different from a normal master container.
Have multiple Jobs each taking care of one master
This takes care of only local.

This is required in HA, otherwise the following error will be thrown
2020-02-20 15:50:19,510 ERROR Format - Failed to format
java.lang.IllegalStateException: The cluster addresses ([alluxio-master-0:19200, alluxio-master-1:19200, alluxio-master-2:19200]) must contain the local master address (alluxio-format-master-0-2pm8w:19200)
	at com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState(Preconditions.java:823)
	at alluxio.master.journal.raft.RaftJournalConfiguration.validate(RaftJournalConfiguration.java:77)
I don't think it makes much sense to retry this format command.
this might be a big limitation, is there a way to get rid of this requirement? we will not be able to use AWSElasticBlockStore or GCEPersistentDisk if this is the case
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -106,9 +106,10 @@ jobMaster:
 #   type: "EMBEDDED"
 #   folder: "/journal"
 journal:
-  pvcName: alluxio-pv-claim
   storageClass: "standard"
   size: 1Gi
+  accessModes:
+    - ReadWriteMany # Use ReadWriteMany as the format job will access it
